author: geechorama
msg: THRIFT-821.  Add a method to get a copy of the TMemoryBuffer's buffer.

author: jonathan
msg: Fixed timing problems with topic exchange test. Added support for broker address to Java - it's now available for all three languages.

author: stsp
msg: Fix the following segfault in svnrdump ('session' is NULL):
There is another segfault still but let's fix them one at a time.
(open_connection): Add a docstring. Make the SESSION parameter a pointer
to a pointer so the caller can actually get a useful result from us.
This used to work before r965418 when SESSION was still a global variable.
